This morning was initialed a coalition agreement between the Likud to Labor. The Prime Minister took part in discussions for Benjamin Netanyahu and Labor Party chairman Ehud Barak.
Acting Prime Minister Netanyahu spoke with President Peres, and briefed him about the agreement reached between Likud and Labor, which were achieved in economic and political issues.
Hnsia Frs replied that challenges convenient political, economic and security facing the State of Israel, it is essential to be established as soon as a national unity government.
Acting Prime Minister Netanyahu spoke with Defense Minister and Labor Party leader Barak and congratulated him on this important achievement and for answering the call to join a unity government.
Acting Prime Minister Netanyahu, will open the conference this morning STEP capital management will discuss investment possibilities in Israel and economics flash.
Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu for giving a statement to the media at this time
STEP Conference - Conference businessmen from Israel and abroad took place in the morning between-designated Prime Minister Netanyahu said that he intends to negotiate with the Palestinians.

Netanyahu: "Here you have a partner for peace and rapid economic development", and called on the Palestinian Authority to invest. Netanyahu also congratulated Barak and the Labor Party to join the government
Netanyahu "expressed support for a unity government before and after the elections. That is what we represent now to achieve peace and security."
In a Wealth Management Conference, held in Jerusalem, Mr. Netanyhau spoke about the importance of developing the Palestinian economy.
Netanyahu: "I am calling upon you to invest in the Palestinian economy as well as the Israeli-Palestinian economic relations".
Read the full report at http://tinyurl.com/cbqnvf (English) | The complete report Likud Http://tinyurl.com/cljyp8 site (Hebrew)

Since 9:00 Netanyahu deals with the distribution of roles in the faction. Moshe Kahlon will be appointed Minister of Communications, Michael Eitan - Minister of improving government services to the citizens,
Gila Gamliel - Deputy Prime Minister of the status of women and young people, Iosi Fld - Minister without Portfolio. More live updates: Http://tinyurl.com/cg3p9t
July Adlstiin- agreed to be appointed Minister of performance. Not yet agreed a bag. Other live updates Likud site.
Gilad Ardn- Minister of the Environment, the Minister of links between the government and the Knesset, a member of the Judicial Appointments Committee. Further updates on the site of the Likud.
Limor Livnat Minister of Culture and Sport and overlooks the cabinet.
Just finished today's government conference. I am now preparing for the UNH Annual Conference
Gideon Saar will be appointed education minister and member of the political-security cabinet. Regular updates also available on the Likud http://tinyurl.com/cf37af

Other updates: Moshe Bogie Ialon- Minister of Strategic Affairs, Deputy Prime Minister, member of the Political-Security Cabinet and kitchenette.
Dan Meridor Deputy Prime Minister of the intelligence services, and the Atomic Energy Commission, a member of the political-security cabinet and kitchenette.
Leah Ness and Ayoub Kara will serve as deputy ministers.
Begin serve as minister without portfolio, will be a member of the political-security cabinet and kitchenette.
Today there will be meetings with Silvan Shalom and Yuval Steinitz designed to fill the roles of senior ministers.

Contrary to what is written: The 29th Israeli government headed by Ariel Sharon consisted of 29 ministers (including the Prime Minister), 14 deputy ministers and 43 ministerial officials.
32nd Israeli government headed by Bnimin Ntniho, appoint (after the end of the negotiations), 30 ministers, 8 deputies, less than 40 ministerial officials.
